articles.author: Lenin Ndebele
articles.title: RECAP | How the war in Ukraine played out for Africa - News24
articles.description: Russia's invasion of Ukraine this year thrust Africa into the centre of a divided world where the continent had to carefully choose which side they were on.
articles.content:
• Judging by UN voting, Africa was less keen on supporting the condemnation of Russia.
  • Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky had a tough time drawing attention from African leaders.
